claims.claim: PwC identified approximately $100 million in cost savings from eliminating manual and repetitive activities
claims.quote: They identified approximately $100 million in cost savings, largely from eliminating manual and repetitive activities that took up employee time.

claims.claim: PwC's overall profit rose 20% to £1.37b despite stagnant revenue growth
claims.quote: PwC's overall profit rose 20% to £1.37b, a 20% profit margin, despite stagnant top-line growth.

claims.claim: 88% of senior executives plan to increase AI-related budgets in the next 12 months
claims.quote: According to PwC's May 2025 AI Agent Survey, 88% of senior executives plan to increase their AI-related budgets in the next 12 months, driven by the growing promise of agentic AI.

claims.claim: Two-thirds of organizations adopting AI agents are seeing measurable productivity gains
claims.quote: And among organizations already adopting AI agents, two-thirds are seeing measurable gains in productivity.

claims.claim: PwC reduced external translation service costs by 40 percent using AI
claims.quote: Reduction in external translation service costs by 40 percent.

claims.claim: AI translation platform processes 30,000 words per minute
claims.quote: Alexa Translations claims that its platform translates 30,000 words per minute.

claims.claim: GL.ai bot can analyze billions of data points in milliseconds for fraud detection
claims.quote: The company claims the bot scans data from across the entire organization by analyzing billions of data points in milliseconds.
